# `ConversationContentLineItem` Definition

Item included in an order.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The display name for the item. |
| price | `number` | Yes | The price of the item. |
| description | `string` | No | Additional details about the item (e.g. the length of time to deliver for shipping options). |
| identifier | `string` | No | A client defined value used to identify the item. |
